module.name: approval
module.purpose: The Approval application module supports the requirement to record that an organization or person in an organization is to provide or has provided some degree of consent or dissent on a particular date or date and time for some product data.

inscope.li: establishing a data structure which indicates an approval is needed;
establishing a data structure which indicates the status of the represented approval;
establishing a data structure for relating the approval to product data;
establishing a data structure for relating approvals to one another;
indicating what organization's concurrence is requested or has been given;
where necessary, indicating what discipline/function in an organization's concurrence is requested or has been given;
where necessary, indicating what person in a discipline/function in an organization's concurrence is requested or has been given;
where necessary, indicating what person in an organization's concurrence is requested or has been given;
indicating that a requested approval was denied;
indicating when an approval was given or was denied by means of a date and optionally a time;
where necessary (when a context is required), indicating what the approval is for.

outscope.li: the delineation of what elements of product data may be appproved or disapproved;
all concepts not involved in the specification of Approval.

uof.name: Approval
uof.description: The Approval UoF specifies the definitional information for the concept of approval.

aa.refpath: approval <- approval_person_organization.authorized_approval approval_person_organization approval_person_organization.person_organization -> person_organization_select (person_organization_select = person_and_organization person_and_organization) (person_organization_select = organization organization)

approval <- approval_date_time.dated_approval approval_date_time {approval_date_time.role -> object_role object_role.name='planned'} approval_date_time.date_time -> date_time_select (date_time_select = date_and_time date_and_time) (date_time_select = date date => calendar_date)

approval <- approval_date_time.dated_approval approval_date_time {approval_date_time.role -> object_role object_role.name='actual'} approval_date_time.date_time-> date_time_select (date_time_select = date_and_time date_and_time) (date_time_select = date date => calendar_date)

description.p: This clause describes usages of this module. This module shall be used in the context of another module (e.g. Product and version identification) in order to define what elements of product data can have approvals.
The recording of an approval involves an organization (and typically a person in that organization), a status, a role and a date.
